title: I have a problem with the login page, i cant reconnect. Some one know what i need to do?
body:
im using the beta client and i cant login the came : "we're attempting automatically  reconnect you to League of legends if your internt connection is otherwise ok, check our support page for passible solution"
I dont know what to do my game worked 1 hour ago and no i cant reconnect and login.

replies.body: Im on EUW. I have used TAB to get past the message and still log in successfuly, but the message "trying to reconnect" just doesn't dissapear so I can't do anything including start a new game. The legacy client is also giving me a problem when I start it, "unspecified error occured, update failed" and then closes. Im using Vodacom.
The unspecified error may be unrelated here, and is referring to a patching problem.  At what percent are you getting that error?

Hi this is only an error that popped up after the updated client started giving me the "trying to reconnect" msg, after launching the updated client I would always launch the legacy client. After manually launching the Legacy client through lol.launcher.exe because I can't via the updated client the unspecified error immediately pops up and I have no option but to exit, I can't repair or anything. the message just keeps popping back up after I close it.

The "trying to reconnect button" just dissapeared. I kept my client open all day to see if the msg would ever go away and I can now smootly log into the updated client and the message doesn't reapear for me. The "unspecified error, update failed" msg that occured when launching the legacy client also seems to have dissapeared and its now patching successfuly. Tnx

Hey folks, 

Can you please run the following http://l3cdn.riotgames.com.t1.re/ and paste your results if you are still experiencing the issue. Thank you.

HI, her are the results.

http://4w4x9x.t1.re/

This. Some players may be able to workaround this by returning to the legacy client for now:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

You might receive intermittent errors, but try again.

It seems that some players are experiencing login issues and currently being tracked on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I don't have any news to share right now, but updates will be made there.  Hang tight!
same here, and its my birthday D;
UPDATE: it randomly just started working after retrying randomly. i guess it fixed on its own but i uninstalled the game so i now i have to reinstall the whole thing hahahahahah
Im experiencing the same issues. It has been happening to me since 4am 1/13/2017. If a fix is available i would like to know as soon as possible.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
